alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:08PM CDT until July 17 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR LACLEDE AND SOUTHWESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 307 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Lebanon, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Fort Leonard Wood, Lebanon, Bennett Spring State Park, Morgan, Conway, Phillipsburg, Bennett Springs, Twin Bridges, Competition, Lynchburg, Sleeper, Falcon and Dry Knob. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 112 and 140. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
